reviewText: Just like I remembered it ;D <3 Gotta buy the others now! <33 Awesome condition!!
I love how adorable this show is! Dejiko and her friends are adorable and very well made episodes. I have Volume 1-3 and cannot wait to get more! I HIGHLY suggest this to anyone.

the animini dvd are one of the more interesting ideas to come out in a while they are a combination trading card and anime disc  however there  true benefit lies in that you can check the first episode of an anime and see whether or not you will like the title without spending a lot of money on the full size dvds which are 5 times the price it would b e cool if adv relased all the episodes of a particular series on the animini so if you are interesed in trying a certian series check out the animini it cant hurt
Super cute and funny very good quality animation OK for kids. Some of the nicest chibi-style anime I've seen.
